message: I agree all stores should be closed on thanksgiving. I remember growing up the only think open was 7-11 and the two gas stations right off the interstate. That meant if you forgot anything for your thanksgiving dinner you better be able to get it at one of those locations or you went with out and there was NO SHOPPING until 7AM the next day.

An investigation doesn't prove guilt. More times than not it leaves innocence. So live in a guilty until proven innocent society now. It's disgusting. OK, the FBI has 100 people investigating. Awesome. No indictment yet though. Never mind proof of guilt. PS I'm team Bernie all the way. I'm defending the process, not Hillary.
